::Battera:;

She looked at him and smiled."That was nice of him. And I'm glad you 
trust me." Her face still had pink in it, but she smiled.  She still 
had her doubts, but this bot next to her was quickly washing them 
away. 
"Thank you." She took his hand from her chin and held it in her's.
She looked at him for a moment.

She shook her head. "Ah, how about that tour now huh?" She stood up 
next to him.  She had to again remind herself that she was here to 
make pease with the bots, not fall in love.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm looks at Battera, raising one hand to her chin, turning her 
head to 
> look at him.
> 
> "Hey, I trust ya," he says, smiling, "Don't worry about Rex, 
though, he 
> doesn't trust anyone. But I don't think he hates ya. He didn't let 
me kill 
> you, after all."
